text: "Smile for Me" is a song by R&B; singer Massari. It was released in January 2005 as the lead single from his self-titled debut album Massari. It features vocals from rapper Loon. ==Music video== A music video was made for the song by RT!. It features Massari and Loon with their love interests with other scenes showing them shopping, flirting and dancing with a number of women.
